Eres el Anciano. Has tenido una visión de un futuro condenado, asi que tomaste un puñado de Pips, tus compañeros aldeanos, y los llevaste a un valle vacío para volver a comenzar. Necesitan tu guía para sobrevivir los eventos predichos por la Profecía, ¡así que asegúrate de que tus Pips trabajen duro!
 
       
 
    
 DotAGE tiene mecánicas profundas de colocación de trabajadores inspiradas en los juegos de mesa.
 Construye tu pueblo y asigna a tus trabajadores a sus tareas diarias, cultiva plantas, cría animales, entierra cadáveres, forja herramientas, mejora edificios, entrena profesionales y produce docenas de recursos.
 ¡Tómate tu tiempo y piensa detenidamente antes de pasar el turno!
 
       
 
    
 Los recuerdos del Anciano son inciertos, por lo que cada partida será diferente, con nuevos edificios por descubrir. Juega con más de 200 edificios, 30 profesiones y 70 recursos.
 A medida que juegues, los recuerdos del Anciano volverán, desbloqueando nuevas mecánicas de juego y contenido, como nuevas enfermedades, los misteriosos VIPs y nuevos Ancianos!
 
 Cada turno, los Dominios, las fuerzas que gobiernan el mundo, desatarán eventos cada vez más poderosos sobre tu pueblo.
 Desde veneno, enfermedades, terremotos hasta gatitos. ¿Serás capaz de sobrevivirlos todos y descubrir qué está causando el apocalipsis?
 
       
 
    
 Además de que cada partida es diferente, el juego tiene múltiples niveles de dificultad, así que elige el que se adapte a tu estilo de juego.
 Disfruta de un constructor de pueblos por turnos relajado con sus acogedores gráficos, o demuestra tu dominio de la profecía con los niveles de maestría cada vez más difíciles!
 
       
 
    
 Este juego es una carta de amor a los juegos de mi infancia, hecho con pasión en 9 años en el poco tiempo libre que tuve siendo un único desarrollador de Italia.
 La música del juego es música medieval real, tomada del Códice de Montpellier, reorganizada por Luigi di Guida.
 ¡Espero que disfrutes del mundo de DotAGE!

Vous êtes l'Ancien. Ayant eu une vision d'un avenir funeste, vous avez pris avec vous une poignée de Pips, vos compagnons du village, et vous les avez emmenés dans une vallée vide pour prendre un nouveau départ. Ils ont besoin de vos conseils pour survivre aux événements annoncés par la prophétie, alors assurez-vous que vos Pips travaillent dur !
 
       
 
    
 Dotage propose des mécanismes de placement d'ouvriers inspirés des jeux de société.
 Construisez votre village et assignez à vos ouvriers leurs tâches quotidiennes, faites pousser des cultures, élevez des animaux, enterrez des cadavres, forgez des outils, améliorez les bâtiments, formez des professionnels et produisez des dizaines de ressources.
 Prenez votre temps et réfléchissez bien avant de passer le tour!
 
       
 
    
 Les souvenirs de l'Ancien ne sont pas clairs, aussi chaque partie sera-t-elle différente, avec de nouveaux bâtiments à découvrir. Jouez avec plus de 200 bâtiments, 30 professions et 70 ressources.
 Au fur et à mesure que vous jouez, les souvenirs de l'Ancien réapparaîtront, débloquant de nouveaux mécanismes de jeu et du contenu, comme de nouvelles maladies, les mystérieux VIP et de nouveaux Anciens !
 
 À chaque tour, les Domaines, les forces qui gouvernent le monde, déclencheront des événements de plus en plus puissants sur votre village.
 Du poison aux maladies, en passant par les tremblements de terre et les chatons. Serez-vous capable de survivre à tous ces événements et de découvrir la cause de l'apocalypse ?
 
       
 
    
 Outre le fait que chaque manche est différente, le jeu propose plusieurs niveaux de difficulté, alors choisissez celui qui convient à votre style de jeu.
 Profitez d'un jeu de construction de ville au tour par tour aux graphismes agréables, ou prouvez votre maîtrise de la prophétie grâce aux niveaux de maîtrise de plus en plus difficiles !
 
       
 
    
 Ce jeu est une lettre d'amour aux jeux de mon enfance, réalisé avec passion en 9 ans dans le peu de temps libre dont je disposais par un seul développeur italien.
 La musique du jeu est de la vraie musique médiévale, tirée du Codex de Montpellier, réarrangée par Luigi di Guida.
 J'espère que vous apprécierez le monde de Dotage !

Du bist der Älteste. Du hattest eine Vision einer dem Untergang geweihten Zukunft, also hast du eine Handvoll Pips, deine Mitbewohner, in ein leeres Tal geführt, um neu anzufangen. Sie brauchen deine Führung, um die von der Prophezeiung vorhergesagten Ereignisse zu überleben, also sorge dafür, dass deine Pips hart arbeiten!
 
       
 
    
 Dotage verfügt über eine tiefgreifende, von Brettspielen inspirierte Mechanik der Arbeiterplatzierung. Baue dein Dorf und weise  deinen Arbeitern ihre täglichen Aufgaben zu, bau Getreide an, hüte Tiere, begrabe Leichen, schmiede Werkzeuge, verbessere Gebäude, bilde Fachkräfte aus und produziere Dutzende von Ressourcen. Nimm dir Zeit und denke gut nach, bevor du an der Reihe bist!
 
       
 
    
 Die Erinnerungen des Ältesten sind unklar, so dass jeder Durchlauf anders sein wird, mit neuen Gebäuden, die es zu entdecken gilt. Spiele mit mehr als 200 Gebäuden, 30 Berufen und 70 Ressourcen.
 Im Laufe des Spiels kehren die Erinnerungen des Ältesten zurück und schalten neue Spielmechaniken und Inhalte frei, wie z. B. neue Krankheiten, die geheimnisvollen VIPs und neue Älteste! 
 
 In jeder Runde werden die Domänen - die Kräfte, die die Welt regieren - immer mächtigere Ereignisse auf dein Dorf loslassen. 
 Von Gift über Krankheiten und Erdbeben bis hin zu Kätzchen. Wirst du es schaffen, sie alle zu überleben und herauszufinden, was die Apokalypse verursacht?
 
       
 
    
 Nicht nur jeder Durchlauf ist anders, das Spiel selbst hat auch mehrere Schwierigkeitsstufen, so dass du diejenige auswählen kannst, die zu deinem Spielstil passt.
 Genieße den entspannten rundenbasierten Städtebau mit seiner gemütlichen Grafik oder beweise in den immer schwieriger werdenden Meisterschaftsstufen, dass du die Prophezeiung beherrschst!
 
       
 
    
 Dieses Spiel ist ein Liebesbrief an die Spiele meiner Kindheit. Es wurde mit Leidenschaft in 9 Jahren in der wenigen Freizeit, die ich hatte, von einem einzelnen Entwickler aus Italien entwickelt.
 Die Musik des Spiels ist echte mittelalterliche Musik aus dem Montpellier Codex, neu arrangiert von Luigi di Guida. Ich wünsche euch viel Spaß in der Welt von Dotage!

Sei l'Anziano. Hai avuto una visione di un futuro oscuro, perciò hai preso un po' di Pip, i tuoi amici villici, e li hai portati in una valle per cominciare da zero. Hanno bisogno della tua guida per sopravvivere agli eventi della Profezia, perciò fai in modo che i tuoi Pip lavorino duro!
 
       
 
    
 DotAGE usa meccaniche profonde di piazzamento lavoratori ispirate ai giochi da tavolo.
 Costruisci il tuo villaggio e assegna i tuoi lavoratori al loro compito giornaliero, cresci piante, gestisci animali, sotterra cadaveri, forgia strumenti, potenzia edifici, allena professionisti e produci dozzine di risorse.
 Prenditi il tuo tempo e pensa con attenzione prima di passare il turno!
 
       
 
    
 La memoria dell'Anziano non è più quella di una volta, perciò ogni partita sarà differente, con nuovi edifici da scovare. GIoca con più di 200 edifici, 30 professioni e 70 risorse.
 Mentre giochi, le memorie dell'Anziano torneranno, sbloccando nuove meccaniche e contenuto, come i misteriosi VIP, e anche nuovi Anziani!
 
 Ogni turno, i Domini, le forze che governano il mondo, lanceranno eventi sempre più potenti sul tuo villaggio.
 Da veleni, a malattie, a terremoti, fino a gattini, riuscirai a sopravvivere a tutto quanto e scoprire cosa sta causando l'Apocalisse?
 
       
 
    
 In aggiunta, il gioco ha livelli di difficoltà multipli, perciò scegli quello che più ti si addice.
 Divertiti con una costruzione rilassante a turni, o mostra la tua abilità con i livelli maestria sempre più difficili!
 
       
 
    
 Questo gioco è una lettera d'amore ai giochi della mia infanzia, fatta con passione in 9 anni rubati al tempo libero da un singolo sviluppatore in Italia.
 La musica del gioco è vera musica medievale, presa dal Codice di Montpellier, riarrangiata da Luigi di Guida.
 Spero che ti diverta nel mondo di Dotage!

game.title: Outer Wilds
game.description:
Outer Wilds再添一项大奖，被Giant Bomb、Polygon、Eurogamer和The Guardian评为“2019年度游戏”！备受赞誉、屡获大奖的Outer Wilds是一款开放世界冒险类游戏，游戏背景是一个困在无尽的时间循环之中的太阳系。

欢迎加入太空计划！
你是 Outer Wilds 冒险的最新成员，这个新手太空计划是为了在一个奇怪的、不断演变的太阳系中寻找答案。

太阳系的奥秘...
不祥的黑棘星中心潜伏着什么？月球上的外星人遗迹是谁建造的？能否停止无尽的时间循环？答案在最危险的太空区域等待着你。

一个随时间改变的世界
Outer Wilds 的星球上有许多随时间改变的隐秘地点。在某个地下城市被沙土吞噬之前拜访它，或在某个星球于你脚下破碎时探索其表面。每个秘密都受到危险环境和自然灾难的保护。

带上你的星际徒步装备！
系好你的徒步靴、检查你的氧气量并准备好进入太空冒险。使用各种独特的小设备探查周围环境、追踪神秘信号、破译古老的外星文字以及烤出完美的棉花糖。

game.title: Project Zomboid
game.description:
Project Zomboid is the ultimate in zombie survival. Alone or in MP: you loot, build, craft, fight, farm and fish in a struggle to survive. A hardcore RPG skillset, a vast map, a massively customisable sandbox and a cute tutorial raccoon await the unwary. So how will you die?

The Knox Event is used to refer to the zombie outbreak that occurs prior to and throughout the game. The event first takes place around Muldraugh and West Point, Kentucky. The incident is considered to have begun on the 4th of July, 1993, American Day of Independence. Just two days later the military evacuated residences from around the affected area and set up blockades in what is now known as the Knox Evacuation. The affected area is given the name: the Exclusion Zone, with the primary camp being south of Louisville.

videojogo de 2013

Project Zomboid is an open-ended zombie-infested sandbox. It asks one simple question – how will you die? 
 
 In the towns of Muldraugh and West Point, survivors must loot houses, build defences and do their utmost to delay their inevitable death day by day. No help is coming – their continued survival relies on their own cunning, luck and ability to evade a relentless horde. Current Features 
   Hardcore Sandbox Zombie Survival Game with a focus on realistic survival.
   Online multiplayer survival with persistent player run servers. 
   Local 4 player split-screen co-op
   Hundreds of zombies with swarm mechanics and in-depth visual and hearing systems. 
   Full line of sight system and real-time lighting, sound and visibility mechanics. Hide in the shadows, keep quiet and keep the lights off at night, or at least hang sheets over the windows.   
   Vast and growing map (loosely based on a real world location) for you to explore, loot and set up your fortress. Check out Blindcoder’s map project: 
    Vehicles with full physics and deep and realistic gameplay mechanics.
   Use tools and items to craft weapons, barricade and cook. You can even build zombie proof forts by chopping trees, sawing wood and scavenging supplies. 
   Deal with depression, boredom, hunger, thirst and illness while trying to survive. 
   Day turns to night. The electricity falters. Hordes migrate. Winter draws in. Nature gradually starts to take over.
   Farming, fishing, carpentry, cooking, trapping, character customization, skills and perks that develop based on what you do in-game. 
   Proper zombies that don’t run. (Unless you tell them to in the sandbox menu).
   A ton of amazing atmospheric music tracks by the prodigy that is Zach Beever. 
   Imaginative Challenge scenarios and instant action ‘Last Stand’ mode, on top of regular Sandbox and Survival 
   Full, open and powerful Lua modding support. 
   Xbox Controller Gamepad support on Windows. (Other gamepads can be set up manually.)
 
 We’re a small team at the moment, but we’re also committed to providing the following:    planned Features:    
   The return of our PZ Stories mode that also serves as first ever tutorial actively trying to kill you at every turn. Kate and Baldspot return!
   In-depth and varied NPC encounters driven in a persistent world, powered by a metagame system that turns each play-through into your very own zombie survival movie with emergent narrative gameplay.
   Constant expansion of the countryside and cities around Muldraugh and West Point
   Full wilderness survival systems, animals and hunting for food. 
   More items, crafting recipes, weapons and gameplay systems. 
   Steam Workshop and Achievements support  
 For more details on the game follow us on @theindiestone or visit

game.brief:
Project Zomboid is the ultimate in zombie survival. Alone or in MP: you loot, build, craft, fight, farm and fish in a struggle to survive. A hardcore RPG skillset, a vast map, a massively customisable sandbox and a cute tutorial raccoon await the unwary. So how will you die?

The Knox Event is used to refer to the zombie outbreak that occurs prior to and throughout the game. The event first takes place around Muldraugh and West Point, Kentucky. The incident is considered to have begun on the 4th of July, 1993, American Day of Independence. Just two days later the military evacuated residences from around the affected area and set up blockades in what is now known as the Knox Evacuation. The affected area is given the name: the Exclusion Zone, with the primary camp being south of Louisville.

game.title: A Way Out
game.description:
From the creators of Brothers – A Tale of Two Sons comes A Way Out,  an exclusively co-op adventure  where you play the role of one of two prisoners making their daring escape from prison.  What begins as a thrilling breakout quickly turns into an unpredictable, emotional adventure unlike anything seen or played before. 

A Way Out is an experience that must be played with two players. Each player controls one of the main characters, Leo and Vincent, in a reluctant alliance to break out of prison and gain their freedom. 

Features    

CHOOSE YOUR CHARACTER -   

LEO - A hardened inmate with escape in his sights, Leo isn't the type to make friends. No matter the obstacle, Leo is willing to get his hands dirty and do whatever it takes to get the job done.   VINCENT - Even though he’s fresh off the prison bus, Vincent is determined to break out. With quick wits and nothing left to lose, he'll prove that he's not to be underestimated by anyone, inside prison or out.
    
TOGETHER THEY'LL FIND A WAY OUT - Escaping prison with a complete stranger isn't ideal circumstances, but Leo and Vincent have too much riding on it to second-guess themselves now. As freedom gets closer and closer, they'll have to learn to trust each other if they want to make it to the other side.
WORK TOGETHER TO BREAK FREE - Use teamwork to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles.
EXPERIENCE A VARIETY OF GAMEPLAY - Sneak, fight, run, drive, even go for a little fishing along the way.

localized_title.text: 逃出生天 A Way Out

From the creators of Brothers – A Tale of Two Sons comes A Way Out,  an exclusively co-op adventure  where you play the role of one of two prisoners making their daring escape from prison.  What begins as a thrilling breakout quickly turns into an unpredictable, emotional adventure unlike anything seen or played before. 

A Way Out is an experience that must be played with two players. Each player controls one of the main characters, Leo and Vincent, in a reluctant alliance to break out of prison and gain their freedom. 

Features    

CHOOSE YOUR CHARACTER -   

LEO - A hardened inmate with escape in his sights, Leo isn't the type to make friends. No matter the obstacle, Leo is willing to get his hands dirty and do whatever it takes to get the job done.   VINCENT - Even though he’s fresh off the prison bus, Vincent is determined to break out. With quick wits and nothing left to lose, he'll prove that he's not to be underestimated by anyone, inside prison or out.
    
TOGETHER THEY'LL FIND A WAY OUT - Escaping prison with a complete stranger isn't ideal circumstances, but Leo and Vincent have too much riding on it to second-guess themselves now. As freedom gets closer and closer, they'll have to learn to trust each other if they want to make it to the other side.
WORK TOGETHER TO BREAK FREE - Use teamwork to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles.
EXPERIENCE A VARIETY OF GAMEPLAY - Sneak, fight, run, drive, even go for a little fishing along the way.

From the creators of Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons comes A Way Out, an exclusively co-op adventure where you play the role of one of two prisoners making their daring escape from prison. What begins as a thrilling breakout quickly turns into an unpredictable, emotional adventure unlike anything seen or played before. A Way Out is an experience that must be played with two players. Each player controls one of the main characters, Leo and Vincent, in a reluctant alliance to break out of prison and gain their freedom.

De los creadores de Brothers – A Tale of Two Sons llega A Way Out, una aventura exclusivamente cooperativa en la que te metes en la piel de uno de los dos reclusos protagonistas en su intrépida huida de la cárcel.

 Lo que comienza como una fuga cargada de adrenalina se acaba convirtiendo en una impredecible y emocionante historia totalmente distinta a todo lo que hayas visto o jugado. 

 A Way Out es una experiencia para disfrutar entre dos jugadores. Cada uno de ellos controla a uno de los principales personajes, Leo y Vincent, que unen fuerzas a regañadientes para escapar de la cárcel y recobrar su libertad.

Les créateurs de Brothers – A Tale of Two Sons présentent A Way Out, une aventure exclusivement jouable en co-op, dans laquelle vous incarnez deux détenus s'échappant de prison.

 Ce qui commence comme une évasion palpitante devient vite une cavale imprévisible et pleine d'émotion, absolument unique dans un jeu vidéo. 

 A Way Out doit obligatoirement être joué à deux. Chaque joueur contrôle l'un des personnages principaux, Leo et Vincent, improbables alliés s'échappant de prison en quête de liberté.

Die Schöpfer von Brothers – A Tale of Two Sons präsentieren A Way Out, ein reines Koop-Abenteuer, in dem du einen von zwei Häftlingen spielst, die einen riskanten Gefängnisausbruch wagen.
 
Was als spannende Flucht beginnt, entwickelt sich bald zu einem unvorhersehbaren, emotionalen Abenteuer, wie du es noch nie zuvor gesehen oder gespielt hast. 

 A Way Out ist ein Erlebnis, das zu zweit gespielt werden muss. Jeder Spieler steuert einen der beiden Hauptcharaktere, Leo und Vincent, die sich widerwillig zusammentun, um aus dem Gefängnis auszubrechen und ihre Freiheit zurückzugewinnen.

Dos criadores de Brothers – A Tale of Two Sons chega A Way Out, uma aventura exclusivamente cooperativa onde assumes o papel de um presidiário envolvido numa audaz fuga da prisão.

 O que começa numa fuga eletrizante depressa se transforma numa aventura imprevisível e emocionante diferente de tudo o que já viste ou jogaste. 

 A Way Out tem de ser jogado a dois. Cada jogador controla uma das personagens principais, Leo e Vincent, numa aliança reticente para fugir da prisão e conquistar a sua liberdade.

Fra skaberne af Brothers – A Tale of Two Sons kommer nu A Way Out, et eksklusivt co-op-eventyr, hvor du spiller den ene af to fanger under et dristigt flugtforsøg fra fængslet. Det, der begynder som en nervepirrende flugtaktion, udvikler sig hurtigt til et uforudsigeligt, gribende eventyr, hvis lige du hverken har set eller spillet før. 

 A Way Out er en oplevelse, der kræver to spillere. Hver spiller styrer én af de to hovedpersoner, Leo og Vincent, der meget mod deres vilje må samarbejde for at flygte fra fængslet og genvinde deres frihed.

Dagli autori di Brothers – A Tale of Two Sons arriva A Way Out, un'avventura esclusivamente co-op in cui interpretare il ruolo di due detenuti pronti a tentare un'audace fuga dal carcere.

 Quella che inizia come un'emozionante evasione, rapidamente si trasforma in un'avventura umana imprevedibile, assolutamente unica nel panorama dei videogiochi. 

 A Way Out è un'esperienza che va giocata da due utenti. Ogni giocatore controlla uno dei protagonisti, Leo e Vincent, improbabili alleati allo scopo di evadere di prigione e riprendersi la libertà.

game.title: Papers, Please
game.description:
The communist state of Arstotzka has just ended a 6-year war with neighboring Kolechia and reclaimed its rightful half of the border town, Grestin. Your job as immigration inspector is to control the flow of people entering the Arstotzkan side of Grestin from Kolechia. Among the throngs of immigrants and visitors looking for work are hidden smugglers, spies, and terrorists. Using only the documents provided by travelers and the Ministry of Admission's primitive inspect, search, and fingerprint systems you must decide who can enter Arstotzka and who will be turned away or arrested.

The gameplay of Papers, Please focuses on the work life of an immigration inspector at a border checkpoint for the fictitious Eastern Bloc country of Arstotzka. The player inspects would-be immigrants' documents and uses a sparse array of tools to determine whether the papers are in order for the purpose of keeping spies, smugglers and other unwanted individuals out of the country. At the end of each in-game day, the player earns money based on how many immigrants they processed less any penalties for mistakes, and then must decide on a simple budget to spend that money on rent, food, heat, and other necessities in low-class housing for themselves and their family. As relations between Arstotzka and nearby countries deteriorate due to multiple terrorist attacks, each day introduces a new set of rules for immigration based on the game's story, such as denying citizens of specific countries or demanding more exacting identification from citizens. The player may be challenged with moral dilemmas and social engineering as the game progresses; such as allowing the supposed spouse of one immigrant through despite them lacking complete papers, even though they may be planning to attack your fellow guards.
A mysterious anti-government organisation also appears, with several of its members appearing in the checkpoint, giving the inspector orders on what to do in order to help the organisation bring down the government and establish a new one; the player can choose whether or not to help this organisation.
The game has a scripted story mode with multiple possible endings depending on the player's previous actions, as well as an unlockable, randomized endless-play mode.
Papers, Please has been praised by the sense of immersion provided by the game mechanics, and the intense emotional reaction.[12] CBC News' Jonathan Ore called Papers, Please a "nerve-racking sleuthing game with relentless pacing and dozens of compelling characters - all from a desk job"

The gameplay of Papers, Please focuses on the work life of an immigration inspector at a border checkpoint for the fictitious Eastern Bloc country of Arstotzka. The player inspects would-be immigrants' documents and uses a sparse array of tools to determine whether the papers are in order for the purpose of keeping spies, smugglers and other unwanted individuals out of the country. At the end of each in-game day, the player earns money based on how many immigrants they processed less any penalties for mistakes, and then must decide on a simple budget to spend that money on rent, food, heat, and other necessities in low-class housing for themselves and their family. As relations between Arstotzka and nearby countries deteriorate due to multiple terrorist attacks, each day introduces a new set of rules for immigration based on the game's story, such as denying citizens of specific countries or demanding more exacting identification from citizens. The player may be challenged with moral dilemmas and social engineering as the game progresses; such as allowing the supposed spouse of one immigrant through despite them lacking complete papers, even though they may be planning to attack your fellow guards.
A mysterious anti-government organisation also appears, with several of its members appearing in the checkpoint, giving the inspector orders on what to do in order to help the organisation bring down the government and establish a new one; the player can choose whether or not to help this organisation.
The game has a scripted story mode with multiple possible endings depending on the player's previous actions, as well as an unlockable, randomized endless-play mode.
Papers, Please has been praised by the sense of immersion provided by the game mechanics, and the intense emotional reaction.[12] CBC News' Jonathan Ore called Papers, Please a "nerve-racking sleuthing game with relentless pacing and dozens of compelling characters - all from a desk job"

game.brief:
The communist state of Arstotzka has just ended a 6-year war with neighboring Kolechia and reclaimed its rightful half of the border town, Grestin. Your job as immigration inspector is to control the flow of people entering the Arstotzkan side of Grestin from Kolechia. Among the throngs of immigrants and visitors looking for work are hidden smugglers, spies, and terrorists. Using only the documents provided by travelers and the Ministry of Admission's primitive inspect, search, and fingerprint systems you must decide who can enter Arstotzka and who will be turned away or arrested.

game.title: The Sims 3
game.description:
In The Sims 3, you can create Sims with unique personalities, fulfill their desires, and control their lives within a customizable living neighborhood. Unlock all-new Karma Powers and unleash them on your Sims: help your Sim get lucky with the power of "love connector", bless them with the power of "age defiler" or "instant beauty" or curse them with an "instant enemy". Use these powers wisely, because they may have unexpected results! As you guide your Sims through life, you can complete challenges to unlock additional items, new buildings and landmarks.

Create over a million unique Sims and control their lives. Customize everything from their appearances, to their personalities and even the home of their dreams. Then, send your Sims out to explore new locations around town and to meet other Sims in the neighborhood. With all-new quick challenges and rewarding game play, The Sims 3 gives you the freedom to choose whether (or not!) to fulfill your Sims’ destinies and make their wishes come true.

Powerful character design tools let you make exactly who you want. Robust building features allow for precise control over your Sims' home. And your Sims can explore a huge neighborhood to their heart’s content. Day or night, work or play, the world is your Sims' oyster.

It’s easy and fun to make your unique Sims look just right. From the face and body shaping options to the vast and ever-growing range of clothing choices to the intriguing personality types, you can create the character of your dreams… or even make yourself!

Sims can roam freely throughout the town. Visit the local bistro, check out the new nightclub, get a few reps in at the gym, whatever strikes your Sims' fancy is theirs to pursue… and they’ll never have to wait in line!

Whether or not you believe in destiny, you can help your Sims achieve their dreams. During their lifetimes, Sims will want different things based on their individual personality traits. Fulfilling these desires gets you points to spend purchasing new items for your Sims. And it’ll give you a nice warm feeling, too.

game.title: This War of Mine
game.description:
In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle.

The pace of This War of Mine is imposed by the day and night cycle. During the day snipers outside stop you from leaving your refuge, so you need to focus on maintaining your hideout: crafting, trading and taking care of your survivors. At night, take one of your civilians on a mission to scavenge through a set of unique locations for items that will help you stay alive.

Make life-and-death decisions driven by your conscience. Try to protect everybody from your shelter or sacrifice some of them for longer-term survival. During war, there are no good or bad decisions; there is only survival. The sooner you realize that, the better.

game.title: Wolfenstein: The New Order
game.description:
Wolfenstein: The New Order is an action-adventure shooter game played from a first-person perspective. It is the semi-sequel to 2009's Wolfenstein, however utilizes very little from the game and drops any direct references to veil or supernatural.

To progress through the story, the player battle enemies throughout levels. The game utilizes a health system in which players' health is divided into separate sections that regenerate; if an entire section is lost, the player must use a health pack to replenish the missing health. In combat, a cover system can be used as assistance against enemies. The player have the ability to lean around, over, and under cover, which can be used as a tactical advantage during shootouts and stealth levels. The game gives the player a wide variety of weapon options—they can be found on the ground, retrieved from dead enemies, or removed from their stationary position and carried around.

Three years after the destruction of the Black Sun portal, the Nazis have deployed advanced technologies enabling them to turn the tide against the Allies. B.J. Blazkowicz is chasing down his arch-enemy General Wilhelm "Deathshead" Strasse, knowing that if he can kill Deathshead, the Nazi war machine will be crippled. His plans backfire however and Blazkowicz is mortally wounded and put into a partial coma. After being rescued by a Polish fishing vessel and taken to an asylum in Poland where 14 years pass, he is emerging into this world of darkness, dominated by the Nazis. Blazkowicz arms up once again and sets out to reignite the flames of rebellion and toppling the Nazi regime.

game.title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege X
game.description: Inspired by the reality of counter terrorist operatives across the world, Rainbow Six Siege invites players to master the art of destruction. Intense close quarters confrontations, high lethality, tactics, team play, and explosive action are at the center of the experience. The multiplayer gameplay of Rainbow Six Siege sets a new bar for intense firefights and expert strategy in the rich legacy of past Rainbow Six games.

localized_title.text: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege X
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege X
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege X
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege X
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege X
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege X
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege X
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege X
レインボーシックス シージ

localized_description.text: Inspired by the reality of counter terrorist operatives across the world, Rainbow Six Siege invites players to master the art of destruction. Intense close quarters confrontations, high lethality, tactics, team play, and explosive action are at the center of the experience. The multiplayer gameplay of Rainbow Six Siege sets a new bar for intense firefights and expert strategy in the rich legacy of past Rainbow Six games.
《彩虹六号：围攻》中玩家将扮演警察或匪徒进行一场人性的考验，进行5v5的对决，情节异常紧张，每个举动都影响人质是否能安全被救出，看来育碧已经把“爱国者”的设定完全抛弃了，如果你喜欢SWAT，那么这款游戏就是你的最爱。

Edition Comparison      
 
 
  Free Access Edition      
 
 
  Elite Edition      
 
 The Elite Edition includes:
 - Access to Quick Match, Unranked and Dual Front game modes with a selection of Operators
 - Access to Ranked playlists and Siege Cup
 - Instant unlock of 16 additional Operators
 
 
  Ultimate Edition      
 
 The Ultimate Edition includes:
 - Access to Quick Match, Unranked and Dual Front game modes with a selection of operators
 - Access to Ranked playlists and Siege Cup
 - Instant unlock of 52 additional operators
 - The Disruptor Pack, containing cosmetic bundles for four operators: Nøkk, Warden, Frost, and Maverick
 
 
  PC Specifications      
 
 
  About the Game Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege X is the undisputed reference in tactical team shooters, where elite strategy and execution triumph.
 Enjoy free access to Quick Match, Unranked and Dual Front game modes with a selection of operators.
 
 CERTAIN FEATURES LIKE RANKED PLAYLISTS, SIEGE CUP, ADDITIONAL OPERATORS, AND COSMETICS, REQUIRE PAYMENT TO UNLOCK.
 
 Siege X marks the biggest evolution in the game's history, bringing a visual overhaul, an enhanced player experience, and gameplay changes that deepen the game’s tactical core. HIGH STAKES 5v5 ATTACK VS. DEFENSE 
 Alternate between attack and defense, adapting your approach to each operator and map. Feel the thrill and intensity of the action as you leverage next-level destruction and gadgetry to outsmart and outplay your opponents in every round.
       
 - On defense, transform your surroundings into fortified strongholds. Reinforce walls, set up barricades, and deploy traps to control enemy movement. Use surveillance tools to gather intel and anticipate their approach. Hold your ground, adapt to their tactics, and outplay the attackers at every turn.
       
 - On attack, gather intel on enemy positions and the bomb site using your observation drones. Coordinate with your team to breach reinforced defenses, bypass traps, and create unexpected openings. Take your enemies by surprise with vertical plays—striking from above, below, or making a daring entry through windows by rappel. Plan your assault, execute and defuse every situation. TOOLS OF DESTRUCTION       
 Destruction is more than chaos, it is a key tool for your success. Use the environment to your advantage — turn walls into windows of opportunity.  Use state-of-the-art technology to track enemy movements, shatter walls to create new lines of sight, and manipulate your surroundings to secure the tactical advantage. DUAL FRONT: DYNAMIC TACTICAL 6v6 WARFARE       
 Engage in intense 6v6 battles on the largest map in Siege, where teams push to capture enemy sectors while defending their own. Fight your way to the enemy base and claim victory.
 
 Select an operator among a curated list of attackers and defenders, fighting side by side, unlocking new tactical possibilities. When respawning, adapt your operator selection and strategy to shift the momentum of battle or venture into the Neutral Sector to take on high-risk, high-reward assignments and earn bonuses that can turn the tide in an instant.
 
 Dual Front delivers a bold new way to experience the tactical depth and intensity of Rainbow Six Siege. FROM RECRUIT TO ELITE 
 Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege X is the undisputed reference in tactical team shooters, where elite strategy and execution triumph.
 A solid onboarding journey for new players, including a new clearance level path, helping you learn progressively the basics and build the skills and confidence before jumping into tactical action. CONSTANTLY EVOLVING 
 Enjoy free access to Quick Match, Unranked and Dual Front game modes with a selection of operators. HIGHLY COMPETITIVE 
 Join a massive online community of over 80 million players. Watch top-tier pro teams battle for supremacy in the prestigious Rainbow Six Siege Esport Competition.
 
 Access to the game is free; certain features, including competitive game modes, operators, and cosmetics, require payment to unlock.

Edition Comparison      
 
 
  Free Access Edition      
 
 
  Elite Edition      
  
  La Elite Edition incluye:
  - Acceso a los modos de juego Partida rápida, No clasificatoria y Dual Front con una selección de agentes.
  - Acceso a las listas del modo Clasificatorio y la Copa Siege.
  - Desbloqueo instantáneo de 16 agentes adicionales.
 
 
  Ultimate Edition      
  
  La Ultimate Edition incluye:
  - Acceso a los modos de juego Partida rápida, No clasificatoria y Dual Front con una selección de agentes.
  - Acceso a las listas del modo Clasificatorio y la Copa Siege.
  - Desbloqueo instantáneo de 52 agentes adicionales.
  - El paquete disruptivo, que contiene bundles estéticos para cuatro agentes: Nøkk, Warden, Frost y Maverick.
 
 
  PC Specifications      
 
 
  Acerca del juego Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege X es el referente indiscutible de juegos de disparos tácticos de equipo, en el que la estrategia y la ejecución de élite triunfan.
 Disfruta de acceso gratuito a los modos de juego Partida rápida, No clasificatoria y Dual Front con una selección de agentes.
 
 HACE FALTA PAGAR PARA DESBLOQUEAR CIERTAS CARACTERISTICAS, COMO LAS LISTAS DEL MODO CLASIFICATORIO, LA COPA SIEGE, AGENTES ADICIONALES Y OBJETOS ESTETICOS.
 
 Siege X supone la mayor evolución de la historia del juego, lo que supone una renovación visual, una experiencia mejorada y cambios en la jugabilidad que profundizan en la esencia táctica del juego. ALTO RIESGO 5c5 ATAQUE CONTRA DEFENSA 
 Alterna entre ataque y defensa, adapta tu forma de afrontar los mapas y a los agentes. Siente la emoción y la intensidad de la acción mientras te aprovechas de la destrucción y los dispositivos para superar a los rivales en todas y cada una de las rondas.
       
 - En defensa, transforma tus alrededores en fuertes fortificados. Refuerza paredes, coloca barricadas y despliega trampas para controlar los movimientos del enemigo. Utiliza herramientas de vigilancia para reunir información y anticipar su plan de ataque. Defiende la posición, adáptate a sus tácticas y supera a los atacantes en todo momento.
       
 - En ataque, reúne información sobre la posición de los enemigos y los nidos de bombas con los drones. Coordínate con tu equipo para superar defensas reforzadas, despejar trampas y crear aperturas inesperadas. Pilla a los enemigos por sorpresa con jugadas verticales: ataca desde arriba, abajo o arriésgate a entrar en la zona por las ventanas gracias al rápel. Planea el ataque, ejecútalo y desactiva el peligro de las situaciones. HERRAMIENTAS DE DESTRUCCIÓN       
 La destrucción no solo es el caos: es la herramienta para el éxito. Usa el entorno y aprovéchate de él: convierte las paredes en oportunidades.  Utiliza tecnología de vanguardia para rastrear los movimientos del enemigo, destruye paredes para crear nuevas líneas de visión y manipula el entorno para asegurarte la ventaja táctica. DUAL FRONT: ENFRENTAMIENTOS 6C6 CON DINAMISMO TÁCTICO       
 Enfréntate en combates 6c6 intensos en el mapa más grande de Siege, en el que los equipos capturan sectores enemigos y defienden los suyos propios. Ábrete paso hasta la base enemiga y asegura la victoria.
 
 Selecciona a un agente de una lista preparada entre ataques y defensores que lucharán codo con codo y desbloquea nuevas posibilidades tácticas. Al reaparecer, cambia tu agente y la estrategia para cambiar las tornas del combate, o aventúrate en el Sector neutral para afrontar misiones de mucho riesgo y gran recompensa para conseguir bonificaciones que pueden darle la vuelta a la tortilla.
 
 Dual Front presenta una forma nueva y atrevida de disfrutar del enfoque y la intensidad tácticos de Rainbow Six Siege. DE RECLUTA A ÉLITE 
 Una vía de iniciación de calidad para los jugadores nuevos, que incluye una nueva ruta de nivel de autorización para ayudar con el aprendizaje de los conceptos básicos y a ganar la confianza y habilidad necesarias para lanzarse a la acción táctica. EVOLUCIÓN CONSTANTE 
 Cada temporada incluye grandes actualizaciones, con nuevo contenido y características para una estrategia y jugabilidad renovadas. COMPETITIVIDAD ESTRATOSFÉRICA 
 Únete a una comunidad online enorme con más de 80 millones de jugadores. Disfruta de enfrentamientos entre equipos profesionales del más alto nivel en la prestigiosa competición de esports de Rainbow Six Siege.
 
 
 El acceso al juego es gratuito. Hace falta pagar para desbloquear ciertas características, como los modos de juego competitivo, agentes y objetos estéticos.

Edition Comparison      
 
 
  Free Access Edition      
 
 
  Elite Edition      
  
  L'Elite Edition comprend :
  - L'accès aux modes Partie rapide, Non-classé et Dual Front ainsi qu'à une sélection d'agents
  - L'accès aux sélections Classé et à la Coupe Siege
  - 16 agents supplémentaires débloqués instantanément
 
 
  Ultimate Edition      
  
  L'Ultimate Edition comprend :
  - L'accès aux modes Partie rapide, Non-classé et Dual Front ainsi qu'à une sélection d'agents
  - L'accès aux sélections Classé et à la Coupe Siege
  - 52 agents supplémentaires débloqués instantanément
  - Le Pack Perturbateur, qui contient des packs cosmétiques pour quatre agents : Nøkk, Warden, Frost et Maverick
 
 
  PC Specifications      
 
 
  À propos du jeu Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege X est la référence incontestée des jeux de tir tactiques en équipe, où la stratégie et le talent triomphent.
 Profitez d'un accès gratuit aux modes Partie rapide, Non-classé et Dual Front ainsi qu'à une sélection d'agents.
 
 CERTAINES FONCTIONNALITES, COMME LES MODES CLASSÉ, LA SIEGE CUP, DES AGENTS SUPPLEMENTAIRES, ET CERTAINS ELEMENTS COSMETIQUES SONT PAYANTS.
 
 Siege X marque l'évolution la plus importante de l'histoire du jeu et apporte une refonte visuelle, une expérience de jeu améliorée et des changements de gameplay qui approfondissent les fondations tactiques du jeu. PHASES D'ASSAUT ET DE DÉFENSE EN 5C5 EFFRÉNÉES 
 Alternez entre assaut et défense, et adaptez votre approche à chaque agent et carte. Vivez le frisson et l'intensité de l'action en exploitant des outils de destruction et des gadgets de haut niveau pour déjouer et dominer vos adversaires à chaque manche.
       
 - En défense, transformez votre environnement en véritable forteresse. Renforcez des murs, montez des barricades et déployez des pièges pour contrôler les déplacements ennemis. Utilisez des outils de surveillance pour obtenir des renseignements et anticiper leur approche. Tenez votre position, adaptez-vous aux tactiques de vos adversaires et déjouez les assaillants à tous les instants.
       
 - En attaque, localisez vos ennemis et bombardez leur position à l'aide de vos drones d'observation. Coordonnez les efforts de votre équipe pour percer les défenses, déjouer les pièges et créer des ouvertures inattendues. Surprenez vos ennemis grâce à la verticalité, approchez par au-dessus, par en dessous, ou osez une entrée par les fenêtres avec le rappel. Planifiez votre assaut, mettez-le à exécution, et désamorcez toutes les situations. OUTILS DE DESTRUCTION       
 La destruction est plus que du chaos, c'est la clé de votre succès. Utilisez l'environnement à votre avantage, transformez les murs en fenêtres d'opportunité.  Utilisez une technologie de pointe pour suivre les déplacements de vos adversaires, brisez des murs pour créer de nouvelles lignes de tir et manipulez votre environnement pour prendre l'avantage tactique. DUAL FRONT : GUERRE TACTIQUE DYNAMIQUE EN 6C6       
 Prenez part à des combats intenses en 6c6 sur la plus grande carte de Siege dans lesquels les équipes s'affrontent pour capturer les secteurs ennemis tout en protégeant les leurs. Rejoignez la base ennemie et remportez la victoire.
 
 Sélectionnez un agent parmi une sélection d'assaillants et de défenseurs qui se coordonnent pour débloquer de nouvelles possibilités tactiques. Lorsque vous réapparaissez, adaptez votre choix d'agents et votre stratégie pour renverser la tendance, ou aventurez-vous dans le secteur neutre pour tenter de réaliser des missions dangereuses mais gratifiantes et obtenir des bonus qui peuvent changer le cours du combat en un instant.
 
 Dual Front propose une nouvelle façon audacieuse de vivre la profondeur et l'intensité tactique de Rainbow Six Siege. DE RECRUE À ÉLITE 
 Intégration idéale pour les nouveaux joueurs, avec un nouveau parcours de niveau d'habilitation, pour apprendre progressivement les bases et développer les compétences et de l'assurance avant de plonger au cœur de l'action stratégique. EN CONSTANTE ÉVOLUTION 
 Chaque saison, découvrez d'importantes mises à jour, comprenant du nouveau contenu et des caractéristiques inédites pour renouveler les tactiques et le gameplay. INTENSÉMENT COMPÉTIF 
 Rejoignez une communauté en ligne de plus de 80 millions de joueurs. Regardez des équipes pros de haut niveau s'affronter pour la suprématie dans la prestigieuse Rainbow Six Siege Esport Competition.

  Infos zum Spiel Tom Clancy‘s Rainbow Six Siege X ist der unumstrittene Maßstab für taktische teambasierte Shooter, in denen Elite-Strategie und -Durchführung den Sieg bringen.
 Genießt kostenlosen Zugang zu den Spielmodi „Schnelles Match“, „Ohne Rang“ und „Dual Front“ mit einer Operator-Auswahl.
 
 BESTIMMTE FEATURES WIE „MIT RANG“-SPIELLISTEN, DER SIEGE CUP, ZUSÄTZLICHE OPERATOR UND DEKOGEGENSTÄNDE, MÜSSEN DURCH KAUF FREIGESCHALTET WERDEN.
 
 Siege X stellt die größte Weiterentwicklung in der Geschichte des Spiels dar und bringt eine Grafik-Überarbeitung, ein verbessertes Spielerlebnis und Gameplay-Änderungen, die den taktischen Kern des Spiels vertiefen. RISIKOREICHES 5-GEGEN-5 – ANGRIFF GEGEN VERTEIDIGUNG 
 Wechselt zwischen Angriff und Verteidigung und passt eure Herangehensweise an alle Operator und Karten an. Spürt den Nervenkitzel und die Intensität der Action, wenn ihr mit Zerstörung und Geräten der Extraklasse eure Gegner in jeder Runde überlistet und ausspielt.
       
 - Verwandelt in der Verteidigung eure Umgebung in uneinnehmbare Festungen. Verstärkt Wände, errichtet Barrikaden und platziert Fallen, um die Bewegungen der Gegner zu kontrollieren. Nutzt Überwachungsgeräte, um Informationen zu sammeln und ihre Vorgehensweise vorherzusehen. Haltet die Stellung, passt euch ihren Taktiken an und überlistet die Angreifer jedes Mal.
       
 - Sammelt beim Angriff mit euren Überwachungsdrohnen Infos zu feindlichen Positionen und zum Bombenstandort. Koordiniert euch mit eurem Team, um verstärkte Verteidigungen zu durchbrechen, Fallen zu umgehen und unerwartete Möglichkeiten zu schaffen. Überrascht eure Gegner mit vertikalen Spielzügen – greift von oben und unten an oder stürzt euch durch ein gewagtes Abseilen durch Fenster in den Angriff. Plant euren Angriff, führt ihn aus und entschärft jede Situation. INSTRUMENTE DER ZERSTÖRUNG       
 Die Zerstörung ist mehr als nur Chaos. Sie ist ein wichtiges Werkzeug für euren Erfolg. Nutzt die Umgebung zu eurem Vorteil – verwandelt Wände in günstige Gelegenheiten.  Nutzt modernste Technologie, um feindliche Bewegungen zu verfolgen, zerstört Wände für neue Sichtlinien und manipuliert eure Umgebung, um euch einen taktischen Vorteil zu sichern. DUAL FRONT: DYNAMISCHE, TAKTISCHE 6-GEGEN-6-KRIEGSFÜHRUNG       
 Stürzt euch in intensive 6-gegen-6-Gefechte auf der größten Karte in Siege, in denen die Teams versuchen, gegnerische Sektoren zu erobern und gleichzeitig ihre eigenen zu verteidigen. Kämpft euch zur feindlichen Basis durch und erringt den Sieg.
 
 Wählt einen Operator aus einer kuratierten Liste von Angreifer:innen und Verteidiger:innen aus, kämpft Seite an Seite und schaltet neue taktische Möglichkeiten frei. Passt beim Respawnen eure Operator-Auswahl und Strategie an, um den Kampfverlauf zu ändern, oder wagt euch in den freien Sektor, um hochriskante, aber lohnenswerte Aufträge zu übernehmen und Boni zu verdienen, die das Blatt im Handumdrehen wenden können.
 
 Dual Front bietet eine kühne neue Möglichkeit, die taktische Tiefe und Intensität von Rainbow Six Siege zu erleben. VOM REKRUT ZUR ELITE 
 Ein solides Einstiegserlebnis für neue Spieler mit einem neuen Freigabestufen-Pfad, der euch dabei hilft, nach und nach die Grundlagen zu erlernen und die Fähigkeiten und das Selbstvertrauen aufzubauen, bevor ihr euch in taktische Action stürzt. STÄNDIGE ENTWICKLUNG 
 Jede Saison bringt umfangreiche Updates mit neuen Inhalten und Features für neue Taktiken und neues Gameplay. HOCHGRADIG WETTKAMPFORIENTIERT 
 Tretet einer riesigen Online-Community von über 80 Millionen Spielern bei. Seht den besten Profiteams dabei zu, wie sie im prestigeträchtigen Esports-Wettkampf von Rainbow Six Siege um die Vorherrschaft kämpfen.
 
 
 Der Zugang zum Spiel ist kostenlos. Bestimmte Features, darunter Wettkampfmodi, Operator und Dekogegenstände, müssen durch Kauf freigeschaltet werden.

 Aproveite o Acesso Gratuito aos modos de jogo Partida Rápida, Sem Colocação e Dual Front, com uma seleção de agentes.

 Siege X marca a maior evolução na história do jogo, proporcionando uma reformulação visual, uma experiência aprimorada para os jogadores e mudanças na jogabilidade que aprofundam os princípios táticos do jogo. 5V5 ELETRIZANTE DE ATAQUE CONTRA DEFESA 
 Alterne entre ataque e defesa, adaptando sua abordagem a cada agente e mapa. Sinta a emoção e a intensidade da ação, e utilize a destruição e os gadgets de última geração para passar a perna nos seus oponentes e superá-los em cada rodada.
       
 - Na defesa, transforme os cenários em fortalezas reforçadas. Reforce paredes, monte barricadas e instale armadilhas para controlar o movimento inimigo. Use ferramentas de vigilância para recolher informações e prever a abordagem do oponente. Mantenha sua posição, adapte-se às táticas inimigas e supere os atacantes a cada jogada.
       
 - No ataque, reúna informações sobre as posições inimigas e a área de bomba usando seus drones de observação. Coordene-se com sua equipe para romper defesas reforçadas, contornar armadilhas e criar aberturas inesperadas. Surpreenda seus inimigos com jogadas verticais: ataque de cima, de baixo ou chegue chegando de rapel pela janela. Planeje seu ataque, execute o plano e resolva cada situação. FERRAMENTAS DA DESTRUIÇÃO       
 A destruição é mais do que caos: é uma ferramenta essencial para o seu sucesso. Use o ambiente a seu favor: transforme paredes em oportunidades.  Use tecnologia de ponta para rastrear os movimentos inimigos, quebrar paredes para criar novas linhas de visão e manipular os cenários para garantir a vantagem tática. DUAL FRONT: GUERRA 6v6 DINÂMICA E TÁTICA       
 Participe de batalhas 6v6 intensas no maior mapa de Siege, em que as equipes avançam para capturar os setores inimigos enquanto defendem os próprios. Lute para chegar até a base inimiga e conquistar a vitória.

  Om spillet Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege X er det ubestridte referencepunkt for taktiske holdbaserede skydespil, hvor klog strategi og skarp eksekvering er afgørende.
 Få gratis adgang til Quick Match-, Unranked- og Dual Front-spiltyperne med et udvalg af agenter.
 
 VISSE FUNKTIONER SOM RANKED-PLAYLISTER, SIEGE CUP, EKSTRA AGENTER OG KOSMETISKE EFFEKTER KRÆVER BETALING
 
 Siege X markerer den største udvikling i spillets historie med en visuel overhaling, en forbedret spilleroplevelse og ændringer i spillet, der uddyber spillets taktiske kerne. HØJSPÆNDT 5 MOD 5 — ANGREB MOD FORSVAR 
 Skift mellem angreb og forsvar, og tilpas din strategi til hver eneste agent og bane. Mærk spændingen og intensiteten ved kampene, mens du smadrer dine omgivelser og udnytter dit udstyr til at overliste dine modstandere i hver runde.
       
 - Når du forsvarer, kan du ændre på dine omgivelser og gøre dem til stærke fæstninger. Forstærk vægge, opstil barrikader, og læg fælder ud for at kontrollere fjendens bevægelser. Saml efterretninger, og forudsig fjendens strategi ved hjælp af overvågningsredskaber. Hold stand, reagér på fjendens taktik, og overlist angriberne.
       
 - Når du angriber, kan du samle efterretninger om fjendens placeringer og bombestedet med dine observationsdroner. Koordinér med dit hold for at trænge gennem forstærket forsvar, slippe forbi fælder og skabe uventede åbninger. Overrask dine fjender ved at tænke lodret og angribe fra oven eller fra neden eller rappelle ned ad en mur og komme ind gennem et vindue. Planlæg dit angreb, udfør din plan, og kontroller alle situationer. ØDELÆGGELSESREDSKABER       
 Ødelæggelse handler om mere end bare kaos: Det er et vigtigt redskab, hvis du vil vinde. Udnyt dine omgivelser til din fordel, og gør vægge omkring dig til muligheder.  Hold øje med fjendernes bevægelser med højteknologisk udstyr, ødelæg vægge for at skabe nye sigtelinjer, og udnyt dine omgivelser til din taktiske fordel. DUAL FRONT: DYNAMISK TAKTISK 6 MOD 6-KRIGSFØRELSE       
 Kast dig ud i intense 6 mod 6-kampe på den største bane i Siege, hvor holdene forsøger at overtage fjendens sektorer, mens de forsvarer deres egne. Kæmp dig frem til fjendens base for at løbe af med sejren.
 
 Vælg en agent på en kurateret liste over angribere og forsvarere, der kæmper side om side med hinanden, og lås op for nye taktiske muligheder. Når du respawner, kan du skifte agent og strategi for at vende slagets gang i din favør eller drage ind i Neutral Sector for at påtage dig højrisikomissioner, der giver store belønninger, så du kan få bonusser, der kan hjælpe dig i kamp.
 
 Dual Front giver dig en helt ny mulighed for at opleve den taktiske dybde og intensiteten i Rainbow Six Siege. FRA REKRUT TIL ELITEAGENT 
 En solid onboardingoplevelse for nye spillere med en ny godkendelsesbane, der hjælper dig med at lære alt det grundlæggende og opbygge de evner og den selvtillid, du skal bruge for at kaste dig ud i de taktiske kampe. I KONSTANT UDVIKLING 
 Hver eneste sæson byder på større opdateringer med nyt indhold, der åbner for nye taktikker og måder at spille på. EKSTREMT KONKURRENCEFOKUSERET

 Divertiti con l'accesso gratuito alle modalità di gioco Partita veloce, Non classificata e Dual Front con una selezione di operatori.
 
 ALCUNE FUNZIONALITA, COME LA LISTA SCENARI CLASSIFICATA, LA COPPA SIEGE, GLI OPERATORI AGGIUNTIVI E GLI OGGETTI ESTETICI, RICHIEDONO UN PAGAMENTO PER ESSERE SBLOCCATE.
 
 Siege X è l'evoluzione più grande della storia del titolo e porta con sé un aggiornamento grafico, un'esperienza giocatore migliorata e modifiche alle meccaniche che rendono più profonda la tattica del gioco. ATTACCO vs DIFESA 5v5 AD ALTO RISCHIO 
 Alterna tra assalto e difesa, adattando il tuo approccio a ogni operatore e mappa. Prova il brivido e l'intensità dell'azione mentre semini distruzione e utilizzi gadget all'avanguardia per battere in astuzia i tuoi avversari in ogni round.
       
 - In difesa, trasforma l'ambiente circostante in una fortezza impenetrabile. Rinforza pareti, alza barricate e piazza trappole per controllare il movimento dei nemici. Usa gli strumenti di osservazione per raccogliere informazioni e anticipare il loro arrivo. Mantieni la posizione, adattati alle loro tattiche e batti in astuzia gli assalitori in ogni round.
       
 - In attacco, raccogli informazioni sulle posizioni nemiche e sul sito della bomba con i tuoi droni di osservazione. Coordinati con la tua squadra per fare irruzione nelle difese rinforzate, superare le trappole e creare aperture inaspettate. Cogli i tuoi nemici di sorpresa con giocate verticali: colpisci dall'alto, dal basso o fai un'entrata coraggiosa attraverso le finestre con il rampino. Pianifica il tuo assalto, eseguilo e neutralizza ogni problema. STRUMENTI DI DISTRUZIONE       
 La distruzione è più del caos: è lo strumento chiave per il tuo successo. Sfrutta l'ambiente a tuo vantaggio: trasforma i muri in opportunità.  Usa tecnologia all'avanguardia per tracciare i movimenti nemici, distruggi muri per creare nuove linee di tiro e manipola l'ambiente circostante per assicurarti il vantaggio tattico. DUAL FRONT: GUERRA TATTICA E DINAMICA 6v6       
 Affronta intense battaglie 6v6 nella mappa più grande di Siege, dove le squadre avanzano per catturare i settori nemici e difendere i propri. Combatti fino a farti strada nella base nemica e ottieni la vittoria.
 
 Seleziona un operatore tra una lista scelta di assalitori e difensori e combatti insieme agli altri per sbloccare nuove possibilità tattiche. Quando rientri, adatta la scelta dell'operatore e la strategia per capovolgere la battaglia o avventurati nel settore nemico per intraprendere incarichi rischiosi quanto proficui, ottenendo bonus in grado di cambiare le sorti del conflitto in un attimo.

 《虹彩六號：圍攻行動》豪華版內含完整遊戲，以及出自第 1 年與第 2 年的 16 名特勤幹員。
 
  Technical Test Server   
 
 這是《湯姆克蘭西之虹彩六號：圍攻行動》的技術測試伺服器（T.T.S.）用戶端。此平台的用途是在受控環境下測試遊戲新功能，好讓開發團隊在不影響線上遊戲的情況下反覆測試。
 
 o 請注意：
 - T.T.S. 用戶端是以遊戲的不同開發階段版本製成，不代表實際遊戲的整體品質。
 - T.T.S. 出現的功能不一定會放入遊戲最終版本：多種元素仍處於概念階段，這些測試功能有可能會在開發過程中刪除。因此，T.T.S. 裡面也可能出現延後發布或已取消的遊戲點子。
 - 您必須擁有其中一種遊戲版本（標準版、黃金版、完整版或新手版）才能解鎖此產品。
 - T.T.S. 僅在特定時間內運作。
 
  關於此遊戲 「有史以來最好的第一人稱射擊遊戲之一。 10\10」——《GameSpot》
 
 《虹彩六號：圍攻行動》是一款著重菁英、寫實、戰略的團隊射擊遊戲，唯有卓越的計畫和執行力才能在此遊戲獲勝。遊戲主打 5 對 5 攻防體驗，以及在可破壞環境中的激烈近距離戰鬥。
 
  
 破壞與裝置使用的水準絕對前所未見，一同來參與全新風格的襲擊戰。
 與隊友合作，將作戰環境轉變為滴水不漏的要塞進行防禦。設置陷阱、強化並打造防禦系統，以防遭到敵人入侵。
 帶領隊友穿梭於狹窄的迴廊、設有路障門口和加固強化的牆壁之間，迎擊敵人。結合戰略地圖、偵察無人機、垂降技巧，詳加計劃出擊、掌控所有局面。
 
  
 數十位來自全球各地、訓練精良的特勤幹員可供選擇。運用最新科技，追蹤對手行動。粉碎牆壁，開啟新戰線。破壞天花板和地板，製造新的突破點。運用致命兵器庫中的所有武器與裝置，掌握敵人行蹤，操縱並摧毀敵人與四周環境。
 
  
 隨著《虹彩六號：圍攻行動》的演進一同體驗新策略與戰術。每次更新都包括新特勤幹員、武器、裝置與地圖，《圍攻行動》的規則與時俱進。在不斷演變的地景當中，與好友成為場上出類拔萃、令人聞之喪膽的特勤幹員。
 
  
 在排名賽中與來自世界各地的玩家一較高下。帶上最厲害的小隊成員，與競爭激烈的社群成員一同參加每週錦標賽，或者觀看《虹彩六號：圍攻行動》Pro League最精彩的職業電競隊伍拼個你死我活。

  Ultimate Edition   
 
 The Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege Ultimate Edition includes the full game, 50 operators from Year 1 to Year 8, and the Disruptor Cosmetic Pack.
 
  Operator Edition   
 
 The Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege Operator Edition includes the full game and 50 operators from Year 1 to Year 8.

  Technical Test Server   
 
 This is the Technical Test Server client for Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege. This platform will be used to test new features in a controlled environment that allows the development team to iterate without impacting the live game.
 
 o Please note : 
 - The T.T.S. client is built off of several different builds at various stages of development, and may not represent the overall quality of the game. 
 - Features seen on the T.T.S. might never make it in the final game: various components are still in conceptual stages and might be discarded throughout the development process. Certain ideas that were postponed or cancelled might also be found in the T.T.S. as a result. 
 - You need to own a version of the game (Standard, Gold, Complete or Starter Edition) to unlock this product
 - The TTS will only function during specific timeframes.
 
  About the Game “One of the best first-person shooters ever made. 10\10” – GameSpot
 
 Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege is an elite, realistic, tactical team-based shooter where superior planning and execution triumph. It features 5v5 attack vs. defense gameplay and intense close-quarters combat in destructible environments.
 
  
 Engage in a brand-new style of assault using an unrivaled level of destruction and gadgetry. 
 On defense, coordinate with your team to transform your environments into strongholds. Trap, fortify and create defensive systems to prevent being breached by the enemy.
 On attack, lead your team through narrow corridors, barricaded doorways and reinforced walls. Combine tactical maps, observation drones, rappelling and more to plan, attack and defuse every situation.
 
  
 Choose from dozens of highly trained, Special Forces operators from around the world. Deploy the latest technology to track enemy movement. Shatter walls to open new lines of fire. Breach ceilings and floors to create new access points. Employ every weapon and gadget from your deadly arsenal to locate, manipulate and destroy your enemies and the environment around them.
 
  
 Experience new strategies and tactics as Rainbow Six Siege evolves over time. Change the rules of Siege with every update that includes new operators, weapons, gadgets and maps. Evolve alongside the ever-changing landscape with your friends and become the most experienced and dangerous operators out there.
 
  
 Compete against others from around the world in ranked match play. Grab your best squad and join the competitive community in weekly tournaments or watch the best professional teams battle it out in the Rainbow Six Siege Pro League.

  Technical Test Server   
 
 Este es el servidor de Pruebas Técnicas de Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege, una plataforma que se utilizará para probar las nuevas características en un entorno controlado que permita al equipo de desarrollo hacer cambios y repeticiones sucesivas sin que tenga impacto alguno en el juego activo.
 
 Ten en cuenta que:
 - El cliente SPT (lo encontrarás también por el nombre TTS, de Technical Test Server) se ha creado con diferentes versiones en diversos estados de desarrollo, y no representa la calidad final del juego.
 - Algunas funciones presentes en un SPT no tienen por qué estar en el juego final, ya que ciertos elementos están en proceso conceptual y tal vez sean descartados durante el proceso de desarrollo. Algunas ideas que ya han sido canceladas o pospuestas puede que se encuentren en el servidor de pruebas.
 - Necesitas una versión completa del juego (cualquiera de las ediciones estándar, Gold, completa o básica) para desbloquear el producto.
 - El SPT solo funcionará durante periodos de tiempo específicos.
 
  Acerca del juego "Un referente en los FPS competitivos” – IGN España
 
 Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege es un shooter táctico realista por equipos en el que una cuidadosa planificación y ejecución de tu estrategia son claves para conseguir la victoria.
 
  
 Embárcate en un nuevo tipo de asalto usando un nivel de destrucción y unos dispositivos nunca vistos.
 En defensa, coordina tus acciones con tu equipo para transformar tu entorno en una fortaleza. Pon trampas, refuerza lugares y crea sistemas de defensa para evitar que el enemigo abra brecha.
 En ataque, lidera tu grupo a través de estrechos pasillos, pasos de puerta reforzados y paredes con barricadas. Combina mapas tácticos, drones de vigilancia, acciones de rápel y otros movimientos para planificar, atacar y dominar cualquier situación.
 
  
 Elige entre docenas de agentes altamente entrenados, provenientes de las mejores fuerzas especiales de todo el mundo. Usa la tecnología más avanzada para seguir los movimientos enemigos. Destroza paredes para abrir nuevas líneas de disparo. Rompe techos y suelos para crear nuevos puntos de acceso. Usa cada arma y cada dispositivo de tu arsenal para localizar, manipular y destruir a tus enemigos, y al escenario que los rodea.
 
  
 Prueba nuevas estrategias y tácticas mientras Rainbow Six Siege va evolucionando con el tiempo. Cambia las reglas del asedio con cada actualización, que incluye nuevos agentes, armas, dispositivos y mapas. Avanza con tus amigos en un entorno siempre cambiante y conviértete en el mejor y más experimentado agente que haya.
 
  
 Compite contra otros jugadores de todo el mundo en partidas igualadas. Forma tu mejor escuadra y únete a la comunidad competitiva en torneos semanales o disfruta viendo a los equipos profesionales luchar en la Pro League de Rainbow Six Siege.

  À propos du jeu “One of the best first-person shooters ever made. 10\10” – GameSpot
 
 Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege est un jeu de tir tactique réaliste qui se joue en équipe, où vous devrez allier talent et stratégie. Entre phases d'attaque et de défense en 5c5, préparez-vous à des combats rapprochés intenses.
 
  
 Participez à un nouveau style d'attaque avec un niveau de destruction et de gadgets sans parallèle.
 En défense, coordonnez avec votre équipe pour transformer vos environnements en forteresses. Posez des pièges, fortifiez et créez des systèmes défensifs pour empêcher les ennemis de pénétrer.
 En attaque, menez votre équipe à travers des corridors étroits, des portes barricadées et des murs renforcés. Mélangez cartes tactiques, drones d'observations, la descente en rappel et plus pour planifier l'assaut et neutraliser la menace.
 
  
 Choisissez parmi des dizaines d'agents hautement entrainés des Forces spéciales des quatre coins du monde. Déployez la dernière technologie pour suivre les mouvements ennemis. Faites éclater les murs pour ouvrir de nouvelles lignes de tir. Pénétrez les plafonds et les sols pour créer de nouveaux points d'accès. Utilisez toute arme et gadget de votre arsenal meurtrier pour trouver, manipuler et détruire vos ennemis et les environnements qui les entourent.
 
  
 Découvrez de nouvelles stratégies et tactiques pendant que Rainbow Six Siege évolue avec le temps. Changez les règles de Siege avec chaque mise à jour qui comprend de nouveaux agents, armes, gadgets et cartes. Évoluez avec le paysage en changement constant aux côtés de vos amis et devenez les agents les plus expérimentés et dangereux.
 
  
 Entrez en compétition contre des joueurs autour du monde dans des matches classés. Rassemblez votre meilleure équipe et rejoignez la communauté compétitive dans des tournois hebdomadaires ou regardez les meilleures équipes professionnelles se battre dans la Ligue pro de Rainbow Six Siege.

 o Bitte beachten:

  Infos zum Spiel „One of the best first-person shooters ever made. 10\10“ – GameSpot
 
 Tom Clancy‘s Rainbow Six® Siege ist ein realistischer, taktischer, teambasierter Elite-Shooter, bei dem die bessere Planung und Durchführung den Sieg bringt. Es bietet euch 5-gegen-5-Gameplay mit Angriff und Verteidigung sowie intensive Nahkämpfe in zerstörbaren Umgebungen.
 
  
 Erlebt mit einem noch nie da gewesenen Level an Zerstörung und dem Einsatz von Geräten einen brandneuen Angriffsstil. 
 Stimmt euch während der Verteidigung mit eurem Team ab und verwandelt die Umgebung in eine Festung. Erschafft Verteidigungssysteme, stärkt sie und stattet sie mit Fallen aus, damit der Gegner sie nicht durchbrechen kann.
 Führt euer Team während des Angriffs durch enge Gänge, verbarrikadierte Türen und verstärkte Wände. Kombiniert taktische Karten, Überwachungsdrohnen, Abseilpunkte und mehr, um zu planen, anzugreifen und jede Situation zu entschärfen.
 
  
 Wählt aus Dutzenden hochqualifizierter Operator aus Spezialeinheiten auf der ganzen Welt aus. Setzt neuste Technologien ein, um gegnerische Bewegungen zu verfolgen. Zerstört Wände, um neue Schusslinien zu eröffnen. Durchbrecht Decken und Böden, um neue Zugangspunkte zu erschaffen. Setzt aus eurem tödlichen Arsenal jede Waffe und jedes Gerät ein, um eure Gegner und die Umgebung um sie herum zu lokalisieren, zu manipulieren und auszuschalten.
 
  
 Erlebt mit der Zeit in Rainbow Six Siege, das sich immer weiterentwickelt, neue Strategien und Taktiken. Ändert die Regeln in Siege mit jedem Update, das neue Operator, Waffen, Geräte und Karten mit sich bringt. Wachst zusammen mit euren Freunden mit der sich dauernd verändernden Landschaft und versucht, der qualifizierteste und gefährlichste Operator da draußen zu werden.
 
  
 Messt euch in Matches mit Rang weltweit mit anderen Spielern. Versammelt euren besten Trupp und tretet in wöchentlichen Turnieren mit der wettkampforientierten Community an oder seht den besten Profiteams dabei zu, wie sie in der Profiliga von Rainbow Six Siege ihre Schlachten schlagen.

  Acerca do jogo “Um dos mais elogiados jogos PvP competitivo” – Eurogamer.pt
 
 Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege é um shooter tático de elite realista baseado em equipas, em que um planeamento superior e uma execução precisa são essenciais para vencer. Inclui jogabilidade 5 contra 5 "ataque vs defesa" e intensos combates de proximidade em ambientes destrutíveis.
 
  
 Sente na pele um novo estilo de ataque, com inigualável nível de destruição e recorrendo ao uso de gadgets.
 Na defesa, coordena a tua equipa para transformares os teus ambientes em autênticas fortalezas. Usa armadilhas, constrói fortificações e cria sistemas defensivos para impedires a invasão dos teus inimigos.
 No ataque, lidera a tua equipa através de corredores estreitos, passagens bloqueadas e paredes reforçadas. Combina mapas táticos, drones de observação, descidas em tirolesa e muito mais para planear, atacar e abordar todas as situações.
 
  
 Escolhe entre dezenas de agentes altamente treinados de Forças Especiais de todo o mundo. Utiliza as mais recentes tecnologias para detetares os movimentos do inimigo. Destrói paredes para abrires novas linhas de fogo. Faz colapsar tetos e pisos para criares novos pontos de acesso. Utiliza cada arma e gadget do teu mortífero arsenal para localizares, manipulares e destruíres os teus inimigos e o ambiente que os rodeia.
 
  
 Descobre novas estratégias e táticas à medida que Rainbow Six Siege evolui. Muda as regras de Siege a cada atualização com novos agentes, armas, gadgets e mapas. Evolui lado a lado com cenários em constante evolução na companhia dos teus amigos, para se tornarem nos agentes mais experientes e perigosos do jogo! 
 
  
 Compete contra jogadores de todo o mundo em partidas por ranking. Reúne a tua melhor equipa e enfrenta os competitivos desafios da comunidade em torneios semanais ou assiste aos intensos confrontos de jogadores profissionais na Rainbow Six Siege Pro League.

 オペレーターエディションには、ゲーム本編および、Year 1からYear 8までのオペレーター50人を収録。

 『レインボーシックス シージ』デラックスエディションには、ゲーム本編および、Year 1とYear 2のオペレーター16人を収録。
 
  Technical Test Server   
 
 本プロダクトは「レインボーシックス シージ」のテクニカルテストサーバー クライアントです。制御された環境で新機能をテストし、実際のゲームに影響を与えることなく開発チームが繰り返し新機能をテストすることを目的とします。
 
 予めお読みください：
 - テクニカルテストサーバー クライアントは、開発の異なる段階で作成されたビルドを作り直したものであり、ゲーム全体の品質を表さない場合があります。
 - テクニカルテストサーバーに実装された機能は必ずしもゲーム本編に追加されるわけではありません。多くの機能がコンセプト段階であり開発の過程で実装中止になる場合があります。そのため結果的に延期または中止になった特定のコンセプトがテクニカルテストサーバーに実装されている場合があります。
 - 本プロダクトを使用するには、ゲームのいずれかのエディション（スタンダード、ゴールド、コンプリート、スターター）が必要です。
 - テクニカルテストサーバーは特定の期間でのみ稼働します。
 
  ゲームについて “One of the best first-person shooters ever made. 10\10” – GameSpot
 
 『レインボーシックス シージ』は、優れた計画とその遂行が勝利をもたらす、リアルで戦術的なチームベースの素晴らしいシューターゲーム。5v5の攻撃側vs防御側で繰り広げられるゲームプレイと、破壊可能な環境での激しい近接戦闘が特徴だ。
 
  
 他に類を見ない破壊工作のツールやガジェットを駆使して、全く新しいスタイルで戦いに挑もう。
 防衛側は、チームと連携して自分たちの周囲に拠点を築くことが求められる。トラップを仕掛け、防備を強化し、防衛システムを構築して敵の突破を阻止しろ。
 攻撃側は、チームを指揮して狭い通路、塞がれた出入口、補強された壁を突破することが求められる。作戦マップ、偵察ドローン、ラペリングなどを組み合わせて、計画を練り、攻撃を仕掛け、あらゆる状況を打破しよう。
 
  
 世界各地の数十名に及ぶ、鍛え抜かれた特殊部隊のオペレーターから選択しよう。最新テクノロジーで敵の動きを追跡するもよし、壁を粉砕して新たな射線を開くもよし、あるいは天井や床を破壊して新たな突破口を切り開くこともできる。強力な武器やガジェットの数々を駆使して、周囲の環境を味方につけ、敵を見つけてせん滅させろ。
 
  
 絶えず進化してきた「レインボーシックス　シージ」の新たな戦略と戦術を体験しよう。オペレーター、武器、ガジェット、マップが新たに登場するアップデートのたびに、シージのルールは変化していく。フレンドと一緒に絶えず変化する環境に身を置き、自らも進化を遂げながら経験豊かで危険なオペレーターの頂点を目指そう。
 
  
 ランクマッチで世界中のプレイヤーと競い合おう。最強のスクワッドでウィークリートーナメントの対戦に挑むことも、「レインボーシックス　シージ」プロリーグで繰り広げられる最強のプロチームの戦いを観戦することもできる。

 - The TTS will only function during specific timeframes.
 
  About the Game “One of the best first-person shooters ever made. 10\10” – GameSpot
 
 Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege is an elite, realistic, tactical team-based shooter where superior planning and execution triumph. It features 5v5 attack vs. defense gameplay and intense close-quarters combat in destructible environments.
 
  
 Engage in a brand-new style of assault using an unrivaled level of destruction and gadgetry. 
 On defense, coordinate with your team to transform your environments into strongholds. Trap, fortify and create defensive systems to prevent being breached by the enemy.
 On attack, lead your team through narrow corridors, barricaded doorways and reinforced walls. Combine tactical maps, observation drones, rappelling and more to plan, attack and defuse every situation.
 
  
 Choose from dozens of highly trained, Special Forces operators from around the world. Deploy the latest technology to track enemy movement. Shatter walls to open new lines of fire. Breach ceilings and floors to create new access points. Employ every weapon and gadget from your deadly arsenal to locate, manipulate and destroy your enemies and the environment around them.
 
  
 Experience new strategies and tactics as Rainbow Six Siege evolves over time. Change the rules of Siege with every update that includes new operators, weapons, gadgets and maps. Evolve alongside the ever-changing landscape with your friends and become the most experienced and dangerous operators out there.
 
  
 Compete against others from around the world in ranked match play. Grab your best squad and join the competitive community in weekly tournaments or watch the best professional teams battle it out in the Rainbow Six Siege Pro League.
